description: Web Developer. Pretty solid programmer, knowledgeable in IP networks, DB management, virtualization and Docker. Eager to learn and contribute to real-world projects.

meo.title: Fullstack Web Developer Intern @ MEO
meo.info:
Traineeship focused mostly on Web Development in Laravel, adding features/audits to a Portal for the Operations team at MEO, also managed databases, and implemented virtualization with ProxmoxVE and Docker.
[September 2024-Current]

redlight.title: Web Development Summer Intern @ RedLight Software
redlight.info:
Summer internship focused on Web Development with the objective to create a website/game for a social solidarity institution.
[June-August 2024]
